reasoning: This candidate has clear evidence of exceptional ability through direct contributions to groundbreaking DeepMind projects like AlphaProof (IMO silver-medalist AI), AlphaTensor (novel matrix multiplication algorithms published in Nature), MuZero, and AlphaCode, demonstrating deep ownership of hard RL and reasoning problems.
